doc.title: Does it still work ?
doc.author: Anupam
doc.body:
I debugged and fixed the blog site code.

The original code was really buggy and the code refused to work on firefox. I have got it working on firefox now. I am yet to test it on other browsers.

It was a long time coming and greatly overdue. I wrote the original code in great haste. However, now I plan on maintaining and refining the code base of this blog to make it much better. And also plan on updating the blog regularly. So stay tuned.

Here's to the journey renewed!
